showScoreExcerpt: “In the end, there’s not a lot here: No crazy shark puppets, little sense of the raging seas nor of tormented, insecure actors — not much for the eye to see and very little happening that you don’t anticipate just five or 10 minutes into the show.”

keyPhrases.quote: very little happening that you don't anticipate just five or 10 minutes into the show
not much for the eye to see

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic systematically dismisses every major element of the production - visual design, acting quality, and predictable storytelling - with no redeeming qualities mentioned. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses strong disappointment with the lack of engaging content and visual appeal, indicating a clear negative recommendation.
